level.heading: Court-ordered disinterment or disposal of ashes not affected.
level.text: Sections 43-101 to 43-114, 43-116 to 43-118, and 43-120 to 43-128 (except § 43-119) shall not be construed to:
Interfere with or prevent the disinterment of any body in accordance with § 11-2311 [repealed]; or
Interfere with the disposal of the ashes of bodies which have been cremated.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-34
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-34, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 43-119.
